original_text: Each morning, everyone picked up as much food as they needed. But when the sun became hot, the food would melt away.
korean_text: 무리가 아침마다 각 사람은 먹을 만큼만 거두었고 햇볕이 뜨겁게 쬐면 그것이 스러졌더라

sentences.original_text: everyone picked up as much food as they needed
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 필요한 만큼의 음식을 주워 모았습니다

sentences.original_text: But when the sun became hot
